text: This is a list of Senators who have represented the Northern Territory since 1975. ==List== Election Senator (Party) Senator (Party) Senator (Party) Senator (Party) 1975 Ted Robertson (Labor) Bernie Kilgariff (CLP) 1977 Ted Robertson (Labor) Bernie Kilgariff (CLP) 1980 Ted Robertson (Labor) Bernie Kilgariff (CLP) 1983 Ted Robertson (Labor) Bernie Kilgariff (CLP) 1984 Ted Robertson (Labor) Bernie Kilgariff (CLP) 1987 Bob Collins (Labor) Grant Tambling (CLP) 1990 Bob Collins (Labor) Grant Tambling (CLP) 1993 Bob Collins (Labor) Grant Tambling (CLP) 1996 Bob Collins (Labor) Grant Tambling (CLP) 1998 Trish Crossin (Labor) Grant Tambling (CLP) 1998 Trish Crossin (Labor) Grant Tambling (CLP) 2001 Trish Crossin (Labor) Nigel Scullion (CLP) 2004 Trish Crossin (Labor) Nigel Scullion (CLP) 2007 Trish Crossin (Labor) Nigel Scullion (CLP) 2010 Trish Crossin (Labor) Nigel Scullion (CLP) 2013 Nova Peris (Labor) Nigel Scullion (CLP) 2016 Malarndirri McCarthy (Labor) Nigel Scullion (CLP) 2019 Malarndirri McCarthy (Labor) Sam McMahon (CLP/ Independent/ Liberal Democrats) Jan 2022 Malarndirri McCarthy (Labor) Sam McMahon (CLP/ Independent/ Liberal Democrats) April 2022 Malarndirri McCarthy (Labor) Sam McMahon (CLP/ Independent/ Liberal Democrats) 2022 Malarndirri McCarthy (Labor) Jacinta Nampijinpa Price (CLP) ==Notes== ==References== Northern Territory Senators
title: List of senators from the Northern Territory
